name: Goddess's Miracle
effects: Restore 1000 (+3.4x, Heal) HP to all allies
Cure Poison, Blind, Sleep, Silence, Paralyze and Confusion for all allies

name: Goddess's Miracle
女神奇跡
여신의 기적
Miracle de la déesse
Göttinnenwunder

desc_short: Restore HP and cure poison, blind, sleep, silence, paralysis, confusion for all allies
恢復全體隊員HP+治療中毒失明睡眠沉默麻痹混亂狀態
전체 HP 회복+독, 암흑, 수면, 침묵, 마비, 혼란 회복
Soigne et retire poison, sommeil, silence, paralysie et confusion à tous les alliés
Heilt von Gift/ Blenden/ Schlaf/ Stille/ Lähmung/ Konfus., alle Verb.
Cura VIT y ven, ceg, sue, sil, par y conf a todos
desc_long: Restores HP and cures poison, blind, sleep, silence, paralysis, and confusion for all allies.
恢復全體隊員HP並治療中毒失明睡眠沉默麻痹混亂狀態。
아군 전체의 HP와 독, 암흑, 수면, 침묵, 마비, 혼란 상태를 회복합니다.
Soigne et retire poison, sommeil, silence, paralysie et confusion à tous les alliés.
Heilt LP und Gift, Blenden, Schlaf, Stille,Lähmung und Konfus, alle Verb.
Cura VIT y elimina veneno/ceguera/sueño/parálisis/confusión de todos los a aliados
